00051  *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052  *       Class:  CmdBusHandler
00053  *      Method:  process_event
00054  * Description:  
00055  *--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056  */
00057 void CmdBusHandler::process_event(IrisEvent* e)
00058 {
00059   //  DRAMCmdState *cmd = new DRAMCmdState();
00060     IrisEvent *event = new IrisEvent();
00061     DRAMCmdState* cmd = ((DRAMCmdState*)e->event_data.at(0));   //TODO needs to set this through manifold kernel's links
00062     event->src = (Component*)this;
00063     event->dst = (Component*)child;
00064     event->type = START_READ;   
00065     event->event_data.push_back((void*)cmd);    //TODO needs to set this through manifold kernel's links
00066 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00067     cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": " << hex << cmd->req.address << ": Sending " << dec << cmd->cmd << " to DRAM " << endl;       
00068 #endif
00069     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+t_CMD, &DRAMChannel::process_event, (DRAMChannel*)event->dst, event);  
00070 
00071  //   delete (DRAMCmdState*)e->event_data.at(0);        
00072     delete e;
00073 }
